description: alarm description:AIS alarm
explain: AIS cell recieved from upstream.
resolving method:Check if there is some defect in the upstream
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-ATM-OAM-MIB::hwAtmOamAlarmAis IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 HUAWEI-ATM-OAM-MIB::hwAtmOamPointVPI i 0 HUAWEI-ATM-OAM-MIB::hwAtmOamPointVCI i 9999

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: vpi.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ATM-OAM-MIB::hwAtmOamPointVPI

description: vci.
if vci = 0, means that this is a F4 point
variables.name: HUAWEI-ATM-OAM-MIB::hwAtmOamPointVCI

description: alarm description:AIS alarm restore
explain: There is no AIS cell recieved from upstream within a time interval of 2.5 seconds, with a margin of 0.5 seconds
resolving method:NA.

event.Summary: AIS cell no longer received from upstream

description: alarm description:LOC alarm
explain: CC sink can not recieve CC cells from source within a time interval of 3.5 seconds,with a margin of 0.5 seconds;Or physical fault is detected
resolving method:Check if there is some physical fault.check if there is some defect bettween CC source and CC sink.check if CC source is configured turely.

event.Summary: CC sink not recieved CC cells from source

description: alarm description:LB abort alarm
explain:1.The corresponding connection is deleted
2.There is some fault in the corresponding board.
resolving method:Until the board changes normal, and renew configureing if necesssary

event.Summary: LB abort alarm occurred due to $v4

description: General trap description:
Used to send loopback result of LB cell, success(1) or timeout(2).
tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-ATM-OAM-MIB::hwAtmOamTrapLoopbackReport HUAWEI-ATM-OAM-MIB::hwAtmOamLbPointLLID s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-ATM-OAM-MIB::hwAtmOamVarBindLoopbackResult i 1 HUAWEI-ATM-OAM-MIB::hwAtmOamLbVPI i 0 HUAWEI-ATM-OAM-MIB::hwAtmOamLbVCI i 9999 IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999

$SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-ATM-OAM-MIB::hwAtmOamTrapLoopbackReport HUAWEI-ATM-OAM-MIB::hwAtmOamLbPointLLID s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-ATM-OAM-MIB::hwAtmOamVarBindLoopbackResult i 2 HUAWEI-ATM-OAM-MIB::hwAtmOamLbVPI i 0 HUAWEI-ATM-OAM-MIB::hwAtmOamLbVCI i 9999 IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999

description: Specify loopback destination LLID, which valid only hwAtmOamLbType being set llid(3) .
variables.name: HUAWEI-ATM-OAM-MIB::hwAtmOamLbPointLLID

description: Loopback result:
success(1) --loopback success
timeout(2) --not recieved loopback cell for 5 seconds after sent, time out
variables.name: HUAWEI-ATM-OAM-MIB::hwAtmOamVarBindLoopbackResult
